props.name: secondaryButton
props.description: Props for the secondary Button component

props.name: bottomMargin
props.description: The bottom margin of the button, or secondary button if passed

props.name: duration
props.description: The duration of the button's animations (show/hide)

props.name: withoutAnimation
props.description: Whether to show/hide the button without animation

props.name: testID
props.description: The test id for e2e tests
props.note:
<TestID> - the floatingButton container
<TestID>.button - the floatingButton main button
<TestID>.secondaryButton - the floatingButton secondaryButton
